TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MainMenu extends System.Windows.Forms.Menu

summary.span: 表示表單的功能表結構。

span.span: Represents the menu structure of a form.

summary.span: 雖然 會取代並且將功能加入至之前版本的 控制項；不過，也可以選擇保留 ，以提供回溯相容性 (Backward Compatibility) 以及供未來使用。

span.span: Although replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項表示表單功能表結構的容器。The control represents the container for the menu structure of a form. 功能表組成代表功能表結構中個別的功能表命令的物件。A menu is composed of objects that represent the individual menu commands in the menu structure. 每個可以是您的應用程式的命令或其他子功能表項目的父功能表。Each can be a command for your application or a parent menu for other submenu items. 繫結要，會顯示它，請指派要屬性。To bind the to the that will display it, assign the to the property of the . 對於必須支援多種語言的應用程式，您可以使用屬性來顯示功能表由右至左來支援阿拉伯文等語言的文字。For applications that will have support for multiple languages, you can use the property to display the text of the menu from right to left to support languages such as Arabic. 您可以建立不同物件來代表不同的功能表結構，為您的表單。You can create different objects to represent different menu structures for your form. 如果您想要重複使用包含在特定的功能表結構，您可以使用其方法用來建立複本。If you want to reuse the menu structure contained in a specific , you can use its method to create a copy. 一旦您有一份功能表結構時，您可以進行適當的修改為新的功能表結構。Once you have a copy of the menu structure, you can make the appropriate modifications for your new menu structure. > [!NOTE] > 剪下和貼上到另一個在設計工具中的項目從一個形式可能無法運作如預期般，如果您要貼上到表單有定義任何功能表項目 功能表。Cutting and pasting menu items from one form to another in the designer might not work as expected if the form you are pasting into has no menu items defined. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立，會指派兩個物件到並將它繫結至表單。The following code example creates a , assigns two objects to the and binds it to a form. 此範例中，您需要建立名為`Form1`。This example requires that you have a created that is named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[Classic MainMenu.MainMenu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.MainMenu Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MainMenu.MainMenu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.MainMenu Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MainMenu.MainMenu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.MainMenu Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: MenuStrip Control (Windows Forms)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個版本的建構函式會建立不含任何指定物件。This version of the constructor creates a without any specified objects. 若要加入至控制項的功能表項目使用其他版本的這個建構函式可接受的陣列物件做為其參數或使用方法屬性。To add menu items to the control use the other version of this constructor that accepts an array of objects as its parameter or use the method of the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立，會指派兩個物件到並將它繫結至表單。The following code example creates a , assigns two objects to the and binds it to a form. 此範例中，您需要建立名為`Form1`。This example requires that you have a created that is named `Form1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個建構函式來指派的陣列物件至當時建立。You can use this constructor to assign an array of objects to the at the time of its creation. 之後已建立您可以新增額外物件至使用方法屬性。After the has been created you can add additional objects to the using the method of the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立，並將指派兩個物件到使用這個版本的建構函式。The following code example creates a , and assigns two objects to the using this version of the constructor. 範例接著會繫結至。The example then binds the to a . 此範例中，您需要建立名為`Form1`。This example requires that you have a created that is named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[Classic MainMenu.MainMenu1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.MainMenu1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MainMenu.MainMenu1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.MainMenu1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MainMenu.MainMenu1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.MainMenu1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 建立新的 ，它是目前 的複本。

span.span: Creates a new that is a duplicate of the current .
A that represents the cloned menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來建立一份儲存中的功能表結構。You can use this method to create a copy of the menu structure stored in a . 您可以使用這個方法重複使用儲存在功能表結構做為新的基礎。You can use this method to reuse the menu structure stored in a as the foundation for a new . 例如，如果您想要建立功能表結構具有相同的功能表項目，與現有但也會有額外物件加入至它，您可以使用方法來建立一份原始和然後新增 新物件複製的。For example, if you want to create a menu structure that has the same menu items as an existing but will also have additional objects added to it, you can use the method to create a copy of the original and then add the new objects to the cloned . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用方法，可判斷目前父代至表單。The following code example uses the method to determine if a is currently parented to the form. 如果在此範例中的呼叫的程式碼不會傳回`null`，然後複製程式碼的功能表結構使用方法。If the call in the example code to does not return `null`, the code then clones the menu structure of the using the method. 程式碼會設定屬性設為 true 的 「 新複本建立，可用來支援從右至左的文字的語言。The code then sets the property to true on the new copy of the to create a that can be used for languages that support right to left text. 此範例中，您需要建立名為`mainMenu1`。This example requires that you have a created that is named `mainMenu1`. [!code-cpp[Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Collapse As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於主功能表摺疊時。

span.span: Occurs when the main menu collapses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`MainMenu1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MainMenu1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#483](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#483)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#483](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#483)]

span.span: Disposes of the resources, other than memory, used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓它所佔用的記憶體可以回收記憶體回收。After calling , you must release all references to the so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則，資源會使用之前，將不會釋放記憶體回收集合呼叫物件的解構函式。Otherwise, the resources the is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the object's destructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Forms.Form GetForm() cil managed

summary.span: 取得含有這個控制項的 。

A that is the container for this control.

returns.span: 如果 目前不是裝載 (Host) 在表單上，則傳回 。

span.span: Returns if the is not currently hosted on a form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您判斷特定至表單的父系。This property enables you to determine if a specific is parented to a form. 屬性通常是使用多個的表單上使用物件，以及您需要判斷哪一個目前正由表單。The property is typically used when multiple objects are being used on a form and you need to determine which one is currently being used by a form. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用方法，可判斷目前父代至表單。The following code example uses the method to determine if a is currently parented to the form. 如果在此範例中的呼叫的程式碼不會傳回`null`，然後複製程式碼的功能表結構使用方法。If the call in the example code to does not return `null`, the code then clones the menu structure of the using the method. 程式碼會設定屬性設為 true 的 「 新複本建立，可用來支援從右至左的文字的語言。The code then sets the property to true on the new copy of the to create a that can be used for languages that support right to left text. 此範例中，您需要建立名為`mainMenu1`。This example requires that you have a created that is named `mainMenu1`. [!code-cpp[Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft RightToLeft { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property RightToLeft As RightToLeft
public: virtual property System::Windows::Forms::RightToLeft RightToLeft { System::Windows::Forms::RightToLeft get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::RightToLeft value); };
member this.RightToLeft : System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項所顯示的文字是否從右到左。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the text displayed by the control is displayed from right to left.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您的選單，以支援由右至左書寫的語言。This property enables your menus to support languages that are written from right to left. 當這個屬性設定為`RightToLeft.Yes`，功能表項目文字會顯示由右至左，而不是預設值由左到右的方法。When this property is set to `RightToLeft.Yes`, the menu item text will be displayed from right to left instead of the default left to right method. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關如何啟用由右至左對齊方式會影響 Windows Form 控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information about how enabling right-to-left alignment affects Windows Forms controls, see the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用方法，可判斷目前父代至表單。The following code example uses the method to determine if a is currently parented to the form. 如果在此範例中的呼叫的程式碼不會傳回`null`，然後複製程式碼的功能表結構使用方法。If the call in the example code to does not return `null`, the code then clones the menu structure of the using the method. 範例程式碼會設定屬性，以`RightToLeft.Yes`上的新副本建立，可用來支援從右至左的文字的語言。The example code then sets the property to `RightToLeft.Yes` on the new copy of the to create a that can be used for languages that support right to left text. 此範例中，您需要建立名為`mainMenu1`。This example requires that you have a created that is named `mainMenu1`. [!code-cpp[Classic MainMenu.RightToLeft Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.RightToLeft Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MainMenu.RightToLeft Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.RightToLeft Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MainMenu.RightToLeft Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.RightToLeft Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指派給屬性的值不是 列舉型別的有效成員。

span.span: The value assigned to the property is not a valid member of the enumeration.
